about_the_game:
FIGHT! KILL! EVOLVE!

The rules are simple: collect orbs and kill opponents to get experience points and evolve into a greater warrior. Every hit by a weapon means defeat - no health points, no shields, no miraculous dodges. Therefore, you must always stay sharp!

Start as a primitive Caveman and evolve through dozens of fascinating evolutions: Viking, Knight, Spartan, Cyborg, Thor, Archangel, Minotaur, Dragon Slayer and many more for you to discover. Be the largest in the arena by the end of a match to earn victory!

EvoWars: New Era is simple in its concept but hard to master.

Main Features:

  • Simple rules - challenging fights,

  • Over 40 evolutions (and more to come),

  • 10 minute long online Deathmatches with up to 60 players,

  • Team matches full of twists and turns,

  • Killing monsters in co-op with other players in Monster Hunt mode,

  • Surprising game-changing events,

  • Play either solo or challenge your friends,

  • NO pay to win - only your skill matters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 2,5Ghz+ or equivalent
  • Graphics: AMD or nVidia with 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: EvoWars: New Era is a competitive multiplayer open-arena game where a single hit means defeat and your power is determined by your wits and size… Easy to learn, hard to master. For daredevils only!
